ch0156_00_gen/0101_0701_02_10:
I could sense your and your partner Pokémon’s
auras from quite a ways away.
ch0156_00_gen/7101_0701_01_10:
People, Pokémon...even inanimate objects all give
off their own aura.
ch0156_00_gen/7101_0701_02_10:
Sensing an opponent’s aura allows you to gauge
how powerful they are.
ch0156_00_gen/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s possible that the best Trainers sense that sort
of thing unconsciously.
ch0156_00_gen/7105_0701_01_10:
Pairing up and battling... Partner Pokémon sure
are nice to have.
ch0156_00_gen/7105_0701_02_10:
Let me know if you ever want to battle,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’d welcome one.
ch0156_00_gen/7105_0701_03_10: Battling is a Trainer's way of greeting, after all!
ch0156_00_gen/1701_0701_01_10: Here, a little present from me to you.
ch0156_00_gen/2501_0701_01_10:
I was traveling for my training and somehow
ended up here...
ch0156_00_gen/2501_0701_02_10: At first, I was a bit panicked.
ch0156_00_gen/2501_0701_03_10:
But I accepted the situation after realizing I’d
stumbled across the perfect place to test my
strength.
ch0156_00_gen/2501_0702_01_10:
A lot of the people on this island have really
strong auras.
ch0156_00_gen/2501_0702_02_10: I’d like to find them and battle.
ch0156_00_gen/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s time to wake up. If you have a will as strong
as steel, it can even triumph over sleepiness.
ch0156_00_gen/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you eating a balanced diet? Make sure you
don’t miss any nutrients!
ch0156_00_gen/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s so dark already. If you’re leaving for an
adventure, watch your step carefully.
